Boots of Antaeus

boots (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 258
magic bonus [boosters]: +E
reinvigoration [reinvigoration]: 5
limited regeneration [limitedregeneration]: 10%
map move bonus [mapmovebonus]: 6

Requires 25E5N to forge (E4N1)

These boots were given to the Favored of Gaia. The wearer is constantly reinvigorated, healed and empowered in Earth magic if standing firmly on the ground.
